entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SoundPlayer from Stream doesn't work for partial reads #80264
  • [API Proposal]: System.Collection.BitArray - New constructors to pass a ReadOnlySpan<T> where T is int, bool or byte #80263
  • [NativeAOT] crash when a background GC thread exits and run pre-mortem callbacks. #80262
  • Icon/Image from Stream doesn't work for partial reads #80261
  • SqlBytes/SqlChars from Stream doesn't work for partial reads #80259
  • Memory leak in blazor server application .net 7 #80258
    8.0.0
  • Manual bounds checks are less efficient #80256
  • NativeAOT analysis doesn't warn when annotated item is accessed via ldtoken #80255
  • [6.0] Test failures on OSX: OSVersion_ValidVersion_OSX, CurrencyNegativePattern_Get_ReturnsExpected_ByLocale #80252
  • In-Proc EventSource subscriber changes its refresh interval to one specified by out-proc EventPipeProvider-based subscriber (like dotnet-counters) #80251
  • System.Net.Quic QuicListener sets QuicAddr.Family incorrectly for the requested IPAddress type #80248
  • JIT: Invalid isSimdAsHWIntrinsic param passed in lclmorph #80239
  • HttpClient tries to verify the certificate issuer in Azure App Service #80238
  • Dotnet runtime 6.0.12 not getting updated in Azure App Service #80237
  • DataContractCriticalHelper is incorrectly declared in reference assembly #80236
  • Http2Connection keeps the ExecutionContext of the first request alive #80232
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: RuntimeHelpers.ResetJitOptimizations #80231
  • dotnet restore hangs sometimes #80230
  • [API Proposal]: Source Generate System.Text.Json Context Class #80220
  • [wasm] Review compiler options (again) #80217
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Unnecessary extra and instruction in uint % 256 #8833
    8.0.0
  • Assembly unload logic with COM interop asserts #79588
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow disabling cache for RSAKey class #79338
  • [wasm-mt] Settle on MonoWasmBuildVariant to control build variants #75152
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Build native osx-arm64 versions of the cross compilers #74175
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in Burgers.Test3 #80129
    8.0.0
  • Running a dll with dotnet6.0.11 fails with error code HRESULT: 0x80004005 #79668
  • [NativeAOT + Objective-C Marshal] request for advise on restricted GC callouts #80032
  • Concurrent struct marshaling can lead to use-after-free crashes due to pGeneratedNewStub determination in CreateInteropILStub #80127
    8.0.0
  • Should MemoryExtensions.Trim use IndexOfAnyExcept? #79621
  • Use new IndexOfAnyValues in RegexCompiler and source generator #78203
    8.0.0
  • Are there any side effects about the warnings? #79344
  • [TestFailure] HttpClientHandlerTest.Http3 - quic.aiortc.org unreachable #80125
    8.0.0
  • Unnecessary assertion "jit\importer.cpp" #79625
    8.0.0
  • undefined reference to 'FreeLibraryAndExitThread' #79440
    Future
  • Convert to generated regex fixer is disabled on regex parse errors hit during counting captures #80004
    8.0.0
  • ServiceCollection.Configure<ConcurrentDictionary<string, T>>(IConfigurationSection) fails in NET7 #78994
    Future
  • Possible memory corruption issue in wasm #79943
    8.0.0
  • Regression in Microsoft.Extensions.Options when IOptionsMonitor<T> created concurrently #79529
    7.0.x
  • [wasm][aot] Perf pipeline: clang failing with `Explicit load/store type does not match pointee type of pointer operand (Producer: 'LLVM11.1.0' Reader: 'LLVM 15.0.0git')` #73184
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Do not run managed pre-mortem callbacks for GC threads. #80276
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve jiterpreter heuristic branch handling #80275
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Restore Advance when reading float/double with XmlBufferReader. #80274
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Ensure only one empty string exists in the UserString heap. #80273
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Update copyright guidance for Creative Commons #80272
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Run library tests with v8 --experimental-wasm-eh #80271
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove incorrect assert from UnixEvent::Wait #80270
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix pGeneratedNewStub determination #80269
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Emit only virtual methods of instances when a class insta… #80267
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] add a total wasm bytes quota to the jiterpreter; adjust parameters #80266
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Convert JitHashTable iteration to range-based `for` #80265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable dedup by default. #80260
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser] make dynamic import cancelable #80257
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use PackedIndexOfIsSupported checks in more places #80254
  • [release/7.0] fix wasm timestamp test by adding 10M tolerance #80250
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO, 7.0.3
  • Add IsDynamicCodeSupported Feature Switch #80246
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Consistently use fgMakeMultiUse in the gtNewSimd*Node APIs #80242
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] WBT: Update expected blazor tfm to net8.0 to match the latest sdk #80241
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Fall back to a canonical SIMD handle in gtGetStructHandleForSimdOrHW #80240
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Check return type compatibility for method GDVs #80228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make metadata reader smaller #80224
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert JitHashTable iteration to range-based `for` #80222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve logging of GC ref map mismatches #80219
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix HFA detection in Crossgen2 #80218
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] Disable llvm for methods/calls with more than 1000 parameters. #80243
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Fold 'x & 255' and 'x & 65535' to a cast #79630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Use platform runtime check for ProtectedData #80196
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Put back setting of field in DirectorySearcher.FindAll #79191
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 6.0.14
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Catch error from loading "node:crypto" module #80249
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.3
  • Fix assembly unloading for DispatchInfo #80203
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Ensure that we don't root the compilation when using a custom exception marshalling type. #80147
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Remove dead code relating to switching AppDomains in CCWs #80187
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Remove use of handles in interp_exec_method and instead use a reserved stack slot #80197
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix pGeneratedNewStub determination #80128
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Avoid emitting gshared methods multiple times when prefer… #80100
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [build] Use MonoWasmBuildVariant to select runtime variant #80024
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mono][interp] Add unbox when calling valuetype method through delegate #79819
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 6.0.14
  • [release/6.0] Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 #79997
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-reliability, 6.0.14
  • [release/6.0] Update Proxy-Support check to be case insensitive #79620
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.14
  • Cross-compile Wasm cross-compilers for ARM64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix compression #79549
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix dump creation on MacOS Ventura #79365
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.14
  • [Release/6.0] Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource (#78213) #79008
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.14
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Automatically calculate the net6 patch version #79299
    7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #79994
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-reliability, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Remove page map from PAL virtual memory allocator #80173
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Prevent warning for implicit ILCompiler reference #79870
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [wasm] Fix dedup support. #80223
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix ConnectAsync with buffer on Windows #79866
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix WXORX issue in EEClass::Destruct #79703
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Make DacValidateMD more resilient to invalid MethodDesc #79862
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [.NET 7] Fix spurious OOMs after upgrading to 7 #79158
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix compression #79547
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 7.0.3
  • Improve the performance of ConditionalWeakTable.TryGetValue #80059
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][wasm][debugger] Improvements in debugging in async methods #79542
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix dump creation on MacOS Ventura #79360
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add warning code to all warnings produced in WasmAppBuilder #79234
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Put back setting of field in DirectorySearcher.FindAll #79192
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 7.0.3
  • [wasm] Don't pass -Wl,--allow-undefined to emcc when compiling .bc fi… #80221
    area-Build-mono
  • cleaning unused method in logging source generator Parser #80233
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Replace the last two SIMDIntrinsic in LIR with NamedIntrinsic and delete GT_SIMD #80027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in the RegexCompiler and source gen #78927
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Fix bug introduced by page bitmap removal #80216
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make sure that entry point is reflectable #80226
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2079941 #80227
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix bunch of incompatibilies of ComWrappers #80119
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use MemoryExtensions.Split in MimeBasePart.DetectEncoding #80211
    area-System.Net
  • Remove unnecessary static field from BigInteger #80212
    area-System.Numerics
  • Switch a few ThrowIfLessThan(..., 1) calls to be ThrowIfNegativeOrZero(...) #80201
    area-System.Collections
  • [HTTP/3] Improved Alt-Svc upgrade test to ignore an externally caused error #80229
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use helpers for implicit casts in importer #78279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ignore stale PGO data in impCastClassOrIsInstToTree #80183
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Allow sharing call temps within statements #79574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable hardware intrinsics tests under gcstress for macOS-arm64 and arm32 #80168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix crash in fixer on certain invalid patterns #80007
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix regex test compilation failure on .NET Framework 4.8 #80207
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Include GC in the default rundown keyword for eventpipe #79671
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Create basic YAML template for the pipeline for building and running the runtime with native sanitizers enabled. #80215
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Improving the SIMD codegen for SIMD12 load/store #80083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • SimdAsHWIntrinsic improvements and cleanup #80134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #80209
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [release/7.0] Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #80188
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #79760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] optimize out 'is this method MulticastDelegate.Invoke' checks in jiterpreter invokes #80181
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix alloc/dealloc mismatches and some buffer overruns found by ASAN #80189
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [release/7.0] Do not override content root with default #79411
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 7.0.3
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Add more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections
  • Enable new analyzers CA1510/11/12/13 and CA1856/57/58 #80149
    area-Meta
  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Fix path to `ping` on Android API 21-27 #80121
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • [release/6.0][Android] Fix SslStream on legacy Android API levels #79277
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 6.0.14
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing the race condition while modifying pending_ops #80190
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add more precise tracking of static bases #80093
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • initial support for '@' symbol in message template #79038
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [draft][browser] enable closure compiler for dotnet.js #80178
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Update suppressions now that netframework facade has forwards #79465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, needs-author-action
  • Add SslClientAuthenticationOptions.ClientCertificateContext #80182
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Partially fix issue caused during VS upgrade #79572
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.14
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan (or field caching downlevel) #79461
    area-Meta
  • Report FOH segments #79985
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clarify INumber.IsPositive and INumber.IsNegative documentation #80026
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [mono][aot] Fixed decompose_flag propagation issues #79855
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Add AVX2 support to IndexOfAnyValues #78863
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Use function pointers instead of marshalled delegates in EventSource #79970
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] createdump: only dump committed memory #79983
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] CreateDump: Only add pages with committed memory #80005
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Transform local indirections off of `TYP_BLK` locals; support numbering exposed LCL_FLDs #79771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Lowercase TargetOS #80164
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Fix path to `ping` on Android API 21-27 #80120
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Fix a few profiler related issues associated with frozen objects #79563
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Decommit memory as needed #79912
    area-GC-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
  • Annotate platform specific hardware intrinsics with the ConstExpected attribute #80192
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable installer tests on osx-arm64 #80198
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Refactor post phase checks #80194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid unobserved ReadAheadTask exceptions in HttpConnection #80214
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to store binary resources when reflection is off? #2152
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: LLVM structs over single pointers, should be ptr #2151
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Issues related to the memory model #2148

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement a few more opcodes #2150
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: test PR for Exception handling dispatch upstream #2149

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Upgrade to LLVM v15 and opaque pointers #2139
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: dispatch #2145
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: merge the change to running tests #2143

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch run with --no-hot-reload disables console coloring in blazor wasm #29769
  • Dotnet watch rebuilds on every change #29759

Closed

  • .NET 8.0 is not recognized when dotnet new an 8.0 web app. #28999
  • When building 3.1.424-SDK, I get an error #29495
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve the stage 0 template error message to be actionable #29783
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29776
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29775
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29774
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29773
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add vb item templates #29765
  • Set the CHCP Language Page to the Corresponding Culture #29755
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29753
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update branding to 6.0.114 #29720
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Branding for 6.0.1xx #29750
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix copy failures when building Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.Tasks.csproj #29534
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update branding to 6.0.406 #29722
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Branding for 6.0.4xx #29752
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.309 #29721
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Branding for 6.0.300 #29751
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29756
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the correct nuget.config file and remove a bunch of extra sources #29288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • extend typo correction functionality with StartsWith and Contains #29350
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Inverted language version conditions in console / classlib templates to support new language features for newer language versions #29636
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 7.0.103 #29723
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix garbage collection for aliased workload packs #29745

Updated

  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary sources from the test used nuget.config file to reduce 429s #29372
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2080420 #29747
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Create an SDK PR guide #29562
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29559
    Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, 7.0.3
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (7.0.1xx backport) #29584
    Servicing-approved, Area-Tools, 7.0.3
  • Add a reminder for the Area-AspNetCore PR authors to help with finding the schedule #29749
    Area-AspNetCore, DO NOT MERGE
  • Adding Microsoft.AspNetCore.EnsureJsonTrimmability host configuration #29719
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    11.0
  • File-local types #6011
    11.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix documentation-comment.md urls #6856

Merged

  • Fixed minor typo in required-members.md #6858

Updated

  • Clarify some aspects of primary constructor parameters capturing #6855

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Handle event accessors from metadata marked `[UnscopedRef]` #66274
  • Refactor option (use explicit type) missing #66272
  • After last update VS stops suggest "Introduce local variable " #66271
  • Strange Behaviour for: semanticModel.GetConversion(someTypeExpression) #66270
  • Internal Compiler Error for ExplicitTuple conversion in CodeGen/Emit #66265
    17.6
  • CompileExpressionTests.SequencePointsMultipleDocuments failing #66260
  • [LSP] Remove NFW reporting in `RangeToTextSpan` after issue is fixed #66258

Closed

  • Cannot activate language client Roslyn Language Server Client in Visual Studio #66262
  • Roslyn workspace should share SyntaxTrees across project targets when possible. #65278
    17.5
  • Template "Analyzer with code fix (.NET Standard)" does not work with VS2022 #66266
  • CS0121 diagnostic produced when an overload is obvious #66221

PullRequests

Created

  • Update VisualStudioTelemetry to 16.4.67 #66275
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove workarounds for fixed issues #66267
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Disallow more locals of restricted type in async methods #66264
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Apply diagnostic filter to generator failure warnings #66263
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • [LSP] Temporarily report NFWs in `RangeToTextSpan` #66259
    Area-IDE
  • Infrastructure/use different images #66255
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle capturing of primary constructor parameters within queries and in type-or-value scenarios #66254
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • use dnceng vms to kickoff helix runs #66253
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66273
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Unify `ConstantValueOpt` and `ConstantValue` properties #66248
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66252
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Port #66241 to Dev17.5 #66269
    Area-IDE
  • Disable testing SequencePointsMultipleDocuments with DebugInformationFormat.Pdb #66261
    Area-Interactive, Test
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2079913 #66268
  • Fix potential invalid TextSpan when reporting FAR results #66245
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66257
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66256

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [BUG] ASP0014: Suggest using top level route registrations #45903
  • Occasional view metadata exception #45900
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, stage1vanilla #45899
  • Add minimum length attributes to Identity classes #45896
  • Blazor Server <HeadContent> dont merge in LayoutPage and Index Page #45904
  • Add interfaces for Identity classes (UserManager<>, SignInManager<>) #45895
  • Microsoft.dotnet-openapi issue with whitespace character folder path #45893
  • In Dot Net 6 Getting this error in log file - The response headers cannot be modified because the response has already started. #45889
  • [AOT] Publish gRPC app as Native AOT with no warnings #45888

Closed

  • dotnet user-jwt create throws Expected '""' error #45902
  • Support description for response status code in the Open API #45871
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plainTextSansFilter #45891
  • PageTitle Headoutlet + Changing layouts causes rendering to fail #45752
    Discussions
  • [Blazor] The `NavigationManager.GetUriWithQueryParameter()` method returns inappropriate URL when the current URL has a hash string #44204
    8.0-preview1
  • Why should a principal be recreated? #45776
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #45876
  • Perf regression: plaintext #45877
  • Remove/replace virtual method in UserManager.cs constructor #45358
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [AOT] Fix hosting/HTTP/server/middleware/routing/auth AOT warnings #45887
    8.0-preview1
  • IISIntegration tests in VS don't detect changes #40387
  • Start tracking "Stage 1" app in performance lab/infrastructure #45523
    8.0-preview1
  • Security implications of using IHttpContextAccessor in Blazor Server #45699
  • [Blazor Wasm, JsInterop] JsRuntime.InvokeAsync finishes too soon, returning null #45770
  • Build errors when building in source-build with the latest compiler version. #45882

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed bug - Passing options to UseStaticFiles breaks Blazor Server #45897
    area-blazor
  • Add limit to length of IdentityUser.PhoneNumber. #45892
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • [AOT] Add middleware reflection fallback #45890
    area-runtime
  • Adding EnsureJsonTrimmability switch #45886

Merged

  • Add build logs around crossgen #45898
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fixed bug in NavigationManager.GetUriWithQueryParameter(s) to include uri with hash string #45870
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Add comment to Blazor AOT analysis disable #45884
    8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45878
    area-runtime
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
    area-web-frameworks
  • Adding untyped JsonTypeInfo overloads #45593
    area-runtime
  • Add Tags property to OutputCache property. #45843
    area-runtime
  • Fix support for parameter names sourced from attributes (#45572) #45591
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update to net8.0 SDK #45879
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2080317 #45630
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Playwright 🎭 🛠️ #45682
    area-blazor, feature-templates, playwright 🎭
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/Web.JS #45864
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Don't check in blazor.*.js files #45883
    area-blazor
  • StringUtilities with xplat-intrinsics (and a little perf-tuning) #44040
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Backport deletion of playwright tests #45852
    6.0.x
  • Added copy parameters to enable parallel build #45779
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix DictionaryModelBinder null reference issue #45515
    area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core 7 Unable to create a new migration using TPH inheritance with an Enum type named Discriminator #29993
  • AutoInclude causes ExecuteDelete to fail and ExecuteUpdate to have useless JOIN #29992
  • Obsoletion message for AutoTransactionsEnabled is wrong #29990
  • Latest news and progress on .NET 8 and EF8 #29989
    Discussions
  • Analyzer suggestion: mark DbSet's nullability suppression property initializer as unnecessary #29988
  • EF Core transaction retries, ChangeTracker and ConcurrencyCheck weird behavior #29987
  • Entity Framework Core 7 keeps creating the same migration for Nullable DateTime field #29985
  • An instance of analyzer Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.InternalUsageDiagnosticAnalyzer #29984

Closed

  • EF throws weird exception #29956
  • ExecuteUpdate fails when target entity has an owned entity #28727
    7.0.3
  • Regarding using HasQueryFilter #29930
  • Opt-out of lazy-loading for specific navigations #10787
    8.0.0
  • Source Browser for EF Core #29937
  • SQLite: RETURNING clause doesn't work with virtual tables #29512
  • [Regression] Replacing PK to PK TPH dependent with different type fails #29789
    7.0.3
  • InvalidOperationException when mapping properties of different types to the same column #29859
    7.0.3
  • SaveChanges circular dependency in unique unfiltered index #29647
    7.0.3
  • dotnet ef migrations add freezes #29826
    7.0.3
  • Generated Model Snapshot throws InvalidOperationException #29534
    7.0.3
  • Change in behaviour of CSharpHelper.Identifier(string name) #29450
    7.0.3
  • Performance regression in model building in Entity Framework Core 7 #29642
    7.0.3
  • QueryTrackingBehavior resets to TrackAll when using DbContext pooling #29733
    7.0.3
  • Idempotent migration script not working on EFCore7.0 for AlterColumn when nullable changed from true to false #29530
    7.0.3
  • EF Core 7 Rev eng: Missing HasForeignKey when referencing a navigation property with a unique constraint with DataAnnotations on #29418
    7.0.3
  • Condition's order will cause different result when using .Contains() to search string cross varchar and nvarchar columns #29646
    7.0.3
  • Mixing sproc and non-sproc commands in the same batch may fail with a NullReferenceException #29643
    7.0.3
  • Cannot access property through interface in ExecuteUpdate setter lambda #29618
    7.0.x
  • SQL Server bulk insert broken when new command applies pending commands and goes over the batch parameter limit #29539
    7.0.3
  • Typo in XML documentation in EntityFrameworkQueryableExtensions #29978
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary dependency on MS.CA.VB package #29986

Merged

  • Fix test string assertion #29982
    auto-merge
  • [release/7.0] Filter out indexer navigations when sorting columns #29981
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • Some tweaks to the daily build docs #29983
    auto-merge
  • Correct [Obsolete] message for AutoTransactionBehavior #29991
    auto-merge
  • Fix grammar in XML doc for ToQueryString #29979
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Allow transfer of ownership of DbConnection from application to DbContext #29960
    providers-beware
  • Working implementation of precompiled queries #29949

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • When installing SDK 7.0, the installation wizard should say "17.2 or newer is required". #13148
